----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Envelop for Live 11.0.1
Feb 2, 2022
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Mono/Stereo/Quad Panner LFOs anchor to song position when in Sync mode
- Added button in E4L Master Bus to send bang to custom decoder for init
- Windows externals included in AuraVerb device

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Envelop for Live 11.0.0
August 9, 2021
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Updated to latest versions of ICST Ambisonics and CNMAT ODOT libraries
- Tested against Ableton 11

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Envelop for Live 10.0.3
January 21, 2019
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
- UI cleanups and refinement on all devices
- New Mono/Stereo/Quad panner devices with built-in LFOs
- Improve distance panning on Source Panner + B-Convolution Reverb
- New Delay Boids and Spatial Slicer devices

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Envelop for Live 10.0.2
June 14, 2018
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Bug fixes to E4L Source Panner interpolation
- Fix 4/16 channel recording on E4L Master Bus
- New AuraVerb reverb device
- New Brownian Delay randomized delay device
- Fix short name conflicts of Spread parameters on E4L Source Panner

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Envelop for Live 10.0.1
May 7, 2018
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Ability to record multi-channel Ambisonics AIFF files from the E4L Master
  Bus device
- Fixes to the E4L Source Panner so that saved preset settings are properly
  recalled

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Envelop for Live 10.0.0
Apr 18, 2018
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The official first release of Envelop for Live 10! This new version of
Envelop for Live takes advantage of the multi-channel audio routing features
of Max for Live in version 10, enabling full Ambisonic spatial audio
processing and decoding entirely within Live 10.
